preqs: Students must have passed AFW1000, ACW1000, AFW1001 (pre 2009) AFG1000 or ACG1000 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {AFG2631, BFF2631, BFG2631}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACB1000, ACC1000, ACF1000, ACG1000, ACP1000, ACW1000, AFG1000, AFW1000, AFW1001} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFC2140, AFF2631, AFW2631, AFW3044, BFB2631, BFC2140, BFF2631, BFP2631, BFW2631}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: Time value of money, Theory of valuation, capital budgeting, portfolio theory and the capital asset pricing model, efficient market theory, cost of capital, capital structure and dividend policy.
